query:
SELECT 
                s.id,
                s.user_id as "user_id!",
                s.start_time,
                s.description,
                s.end_time,
                s.type as session_type,

                s.category_id,
                c.name as category,

                t.id as "tag_id?",
                t.label as "tag_label?"
            FROM session s
            JOIN category c
                on c.id = s.category_id
            LEFT JOIN tag_to_session tts
                on tts.session_id = s.id
            LEFT JOIN tag t
                on tts.tag_id = t.id
            WHERE 
                s.id = $1
                AND type = 'fixed' 
                AND s.user_id = $2
